song.englishname: Like Sand Thru The Hourglass... So Are The Days Of Our Lives

english.segment1: So are the days of our lives" . It seems like every time I get something going . It falls apart right in my hands . It seems like every time I get it figured out and . I weep for my world disgusted . I always learn the hard way, there ain't an easy way to learn . That's what I've learned . Was I tought the right things tought the right? .
